Name: Baklava Simulator
About the game: ABOUT THIS GAME You can buy the market. You can fill and empty the market as you wish. He can talk to your staff. You can call a mechanic for broken materials. When you run out of money, you can go to the bank and get a loan. You can buy new tools. You can customize them as you wish. You can buy new generation houses. You can customize the interior as you wish. If you want to protect your vehicles and don't want anything to happen to you. You can buy a garage. In your spare time, you can go to the disco and have fun and dance as you wish. In order not to die of hunger, you can order food or buy it from the market. In order not to die of thirst, you can order food or buy it from the market. You may need sleep to avoid fainting from lack of sleep. You can increase the popularity of your market. You can add fun to your market by calling a clown. You can work more motivated by giving more salary to your staff. You can have a better one by upgrading the spoiled materials.
